Letter of Gratitude for Describing Buddhist Affairs (Liang Emperor Jianwen) (16) Letter of Offering Money to AÅ›oka Temple, Letter of Offering Money to AÅ›oka Temple, Liang Emperor Jianwen, with the humble words of the minister.
I have heard that the eight countries prayed together.

The seven districts all contain it.
The principle is complete in the spring.

The golden bottle and jeweled case appear when there is a connection.
I humbly think that Your Majesty.
Hangs the heavenly mirror in the domain.
Operates the great power within the universe.
The three existences are equal in dreams.
Look at it with the sun of wisdom.
A hundred medicines are the same in withering.
Moisturize it with the rain of compassion.
Motion and stillness are not one's own, going and staying are caused by things.
There is no name for it.
How can I praise it?
Therefore, I use the red script of Zhaoguang.
I despise the omens of the former historians.
Wearing a jade ornament with a fungus pattern.
I ridicule the treasures of the past.
The difficult-to-encounter is the true form relics of the Tathagata.
The precious bottle shines with the water of virtue.

Donating millions of gold coins, the dana is abundant in the ten repositories.
The treasures are displayed like the Yellow River, and the springs flow like the Shuijing.

I cannot contain my joy and delight.
I respectfully offer one hundred thousand coins.
Although my sincerity is equal to scattering flowers, my mind does not exhaust it.
But it is as insignificant as a drop of water, and its ugliness is as great as the void.
I lightly bring this to your attention.
I humbly reveal my trembling fear. Respectfully revealing.

I humbly thank the imperial edict for the image of the Buddha's ascetic practices and the Buddha's footprints, etc. I humbly thank the imperial edict for the image of the Buddha's ascetic practices and the Buddha's footprints, etc. Your subject, so-and-so, respectfully reports.
The palace attendant Gu Sui respectfully proclaims the imperial decree.
The bronze image of the Buddha practicing asceticism and the Buddha's footprints,
as well as the offering implements, are bestowed to the envoy for worship.
I humbly consider that for six years under the Bodhi tree, he surpassed the four demons.
The thousand-spoked wheel of his feet embodies the virtue of myriad wholesome deeds.
Therefore, those who hear and see him awaken and understand, and those who encounter him are freed from defilements.ğŸ”½The imperial grace is extended, and he is rewarded with encouragement.
I respectfully adorn the railings and eaves,
purify my body and mind,ğŸ”½and look up to the compassionate light.
I humbly await the brilliant descent.
Even with a thousand abilities and four kinds of eloquence, I still cannot express my thoughts.
How can light brush and weak words be able to express my gratitude?
I am unable to contain my feelings.
I respectfully report this to express my gratitude. Respectfully.

I humbly thank the imperial edict for participating in welcoming the Buddha. I humbly thank the imperial edict for participating in welcoming the Buddha. Your subject, so-and-so, respectfully reports.

Answering the Edict Permitting the Relics to Enter the Palace for Worship, Respectfully Answering the Edict Permitting the Relics to Enter the Palace for Worship, I, the Minister, Respectfully Report.
The Palace Attendant Wang Jingyao arrived to proclaim the imperial decree, which graciously extended to me.

But I was not born with wings and did not borrow divine powers.
My body ascended to the Pure Land, high above the Changhe Gate.
My feet trod on lotus flowers, which is not a metaphor for this.
Ascending the jeweled ladder is not as heavy as this.
The extraordinary grace of guidance truly turns back to the beginning of hope.
Looking back at this dusty bondage, I am overjoyed and cannot contain myself.
I respectfully report.

A Letter Requesting Others to Make an Eighteen-Foot Embossed Hemp Cloth Golden Image A Letter Requesting Others to Make an Eighteen-Foot Embossed Hemp Cloth Golden Image, by Liang Jianwen, a certain monk.
I humbly think that the sun of wisdom has hidden its shadow and the wheel of compassion has ceased to respond.
Karmic actions follow afflictions and are blown by love, weaving according to emotions.

Far-sightedly sighing at the golden leaves, deluded by empty words and stopping crying.

how could one leave this mind hall and move this body cave?

The bright mirror stone niche alone wanders in leaving the shadow.

The people gather to see his golden mountain-like appearance.

He pulls out the pain and distress of the six sense faculties.

If one can slightly part with the five families and slightly donate the four things,
Forming this mysterious kindness together to create causes and effects.

In words, I am often embarrassed.
Respectfully informing.
Teaching the Chief Monk, Teaching the Chief Monk, Liang Jianwen The foundations of monasteries and stupas in this state are numerous.

Observing their external traces, they must be extravagant.

What is it?
Casting gold, carving jade, engraving lacquer, and painting tiles.

Admiring the beginning of the dragon vase,
Chasing the remaining admiration of the crane forest.

The way of respecting the deity is already ultimate.
The sage is far away from here.
The principle of thinking of the sage must be profound.
The temples in this land only temporarily arrange images on the day of the response birth.
From then on, they are sealed in chests and boxes.
Even the leaves and clothes leave the body, following the flame and leaving the top.
Or the ten honored ones and five sages share a kitchen.
Or the great being and the Tathagata are both stored in a cabinet.
It can be said that the mind is contrary to the matter, and the appearance is not the feeling.
The mind of increasing effort is small.
In the past, the red case in the stupa only transmitted the relics.
The white parasol on the elephant's head is not the whole body.
In the past, following the painting of the image,
It still made the officials and people recognize and respect it.
Melting gold and casting the mold,
It will eventually make the lord of Yue think of it.
Even if it were paired with a dragon, it would still be able to leap out of its scabbard.

How much more so for the greatest perfect kindness, the unsurpassed collection of goodness.

Yet one would be arrogant towards this carved incense, storing this sandalwood.
Concealing the jade-like eyebrows, sealing the golden palms.
Already different from RÄjagá¹›ha, long entered the four heavens.
Also unlike Jetavana, closing the door for three months.
The jeweled hall is empty, the jade steps are vacant.
The secret curtains do not open.
Not the crooked learning of Zhongshu.
The red walls are long closed.
Like Binqing avoiding enemies.
Moreover, the vast house with clouds hanging down, the lofty eaves with birds perching.
If it were given a jade seat and decorated with golden ornaments,
it would certainly not be dusty, obscuring the wheel-turning figure, or smudged, covering the moon-like face.
The dense windows of lapis lazuli
can easily keep the light wind from entering.
The fine net of dragon's beard
is enough to prevent flying swallows from passing through.
And the principle of reverent respect must be highly regarded.
The mind of joining feet is even heavier.
You can immediately proclaim and order to permanently follow the practice.
Letter to the Marquis of Guangxin, Letter to the Marquis of Guangxin, Liang Jianwen Gang said.

I think that the great propagation of the principle is originally based on the inner teaching.
Now accompanying the chariot of the ten wholesome deeds.
Opening the path of the eight correct principles.
Flowing the water of prajÃ±Ä to wash the dust of mental consciousness.
With this, the spring is raised and becomes the autumn fruit.
Gang always remembers the excellent assembly of Huilin, and also occupies the last position.
From morning to night, bathing in wonderful words.
When the seat is over and the day is left, I retire and think by the side.
Holding hands, we ascended and engaged in conversation.
Looking up at the nine stories, we gazed down at the hundred feet.
The golden pond moved with the moon, and the jade trees contained the wind.

Now, the section on rolling up the curtains rides on one corner of Fu.

I can only look up to the suspended river, but I have no way to receive the teachings.
Empty and nonexistent, it does not polish the emotions and spirit.
Because of delusion and attachment, I sigh that it is difficult to pull out.

I have already forgotten the old and have not yet tasted the new understanding.

This is where the compassionate clouds gather and the ocean of wisdom is also deep.ğŸ”½The remaining waves at the end of the shadow hope to be sprinkled from time to time.

Letter to Dharma Master Huiyan Letter to Dharma Master Huiyan, by Emperor Jianwen of the Liang dynasty The five veils clear the sky, and the bright light shows the seasons.
A hundred flowers of different colors form the brocade of spring.
How is your spiritual state?
I hope it is always clear and proper.
Facing the clear and empty,
You are already beyond the realm of wind and clouds.
Your mind roams and enters the truth,
Far more than the joy of concentration and wisdom.
Your disciple is troubled by worldly affairs, and the fatigue is particularly deep.
Gazing at the Northern Ridge, I have long admired the virtuous ones.
The time of our meeting will surely be able to fulfill our wishes.
Those with karmic affinity are like being hungry and thirsty.
I look forward to your arrival, one day is like three years.
I think of the great benefit, the principle should not be missed.
I send this letter without being able to express my utmost sincerity. Respectfully.
Since dawn, the rainy air has been slightly cold at first.
You have been taking care of yourself for a long time, and you have gained strength.
Although in other Dharma realms you have briefly ceased your transformative activities,
In Jetavana Grove you always have conversations.
The depth of our longing is such that there is no time when it does not accumulate.
For a long time, I have asked the teacher to frequently describe our thoughts.
I do not know if the clever-smiling monk has been able to ferry us across or not.
Previously, when you came, the gathering of subtle matters and principles
was attended by all the elephants and dragons who have all gathered to receive offerings.
The torch of wisdom opens the mind, and the sweet dew enters the crown.
In between, the good jokes completely bring joy and delight.
The thoughts of savoring it turn back and become inexhaustible.
In the past, when I was young, I heard the meaning of the scriptures.
The days of receiving the Way are shallow, and I have not yet deeply faced north.
Although different from Chan Na, the events are the same as the Hua Shui.
Now, borrowing the west, I specially cultivate my original mind.
Seeking principles and questioning doubts depend on the bright virtues.
I did not expect that prajÃ±a would have difficulties.
The present illness has not been cured.
There is no ground to ask for a ford.
How can I help but sigh and lament?
I humbly accept that the imperial carriage will soon be visiting the monastery.
I hope to be able to meet you at this time.
Discourse on the room of blue beans.
Send or the house of red flowers.
To pursue the past year's deep affection.
To express the present moment's sincere thoughts.
This matter, at this time,
Must surely not be forgotten.
The envoy is sent with inquiries, awaiting your reply.
Respectfully yours, Gang.
Replying to the Letter of the Prince of Xiangdong, Reply to the Letter of the Prince of Xiangdong, In the beautiful scenery of late spring, the wind and clouds are splendid.
Orchid leaves are suitable for holding, and the Yi River can be bathed in.
My younger brother is in Shaonan, with few disputes.
At times, he ties up the shade of the sweet gum tree.
Jizhou governs.
Temporarily stopping the busy work of raising the hem of one's robe.
Tang Jing recommends the great words of the fu.
An Tai describes the connected arguments.
Have you enjoyed the beauty of wandering to your heart's content?
I was bedridden with illness at the beginning of spring, extremely weak.
Even the white deer of Mount Xishan fears it cannot cure me.
The red pill of Prince Yu of Chu still worries about not reviving me.
Lying high in the six comforts,
I often think of Bian Que's visit.
Quietly in the four rooms,
I recall the fragrance of Xiudu.
How could I expect Manjushri to come?
I alone think of the eloquence of the guest from Wu.
It is said that the Emperor's compassion covers the whole country and the sweet dew is proclaimed.
Sounding the silver drum in the jeweled monastery,
Turning the golden wheel on the fragrant ground.
The Dharma thunder startles dreams, the sun of wisdom shines in the morning.
Monks and laypeople gather in crowds, from far and near they all assemble.
The audience of monks and laypeople is about two or three myriads a day.
I alone am hindered by illness and unable to hear the Dharma.
How could it be only the injury of Yang and Pu having borders outside?
Zhou Nan has the resentment of being left behind.
On the thirteenth day, I finally attended the Dharma assembly.
For this reason, the lord has returned recently and is not yet able to hold a brush.
Respectfully, the ancestor left earlier and just wants to make excellent clothes.
I think of this every day.
I am deeply concerned and worried.
The river is long.
I think of it in my dreams.
Every time I receive a letter from my younger brother, it lightly mentions my illness and sends me away.
Soon after, there was another letter.
There is nothing to report here.

Various Inscriptions and Eulogies on Temples and Buddha Pagodas (by Shen Yue and others) (16) Various Inscriptions and Eulogies on Temples and Buddha Pagodas, by Wang Huan, Chief Minister of the Southern Qi, Record of the Pagoda at Zhiyuan Temple, by Wang Huan, Chief Minister of the Southern Qi, Record of the Pagoda at Zhiyuan Temple, by Wang Huan, Chief Minister of the Southern Qi, in one piece. The spread of Buddhism to the East during the early period was particularly notable.
It began in Luoyang and flourished in Jiangzuo.
The former General of the Cavalry of the Jin Dynasty, Prince Langya of the Wang clan,
had a profound understanding and deep faith in Buddhism.
He built Zhiyuan Monastery to the north of the temple of his ancestor, the Duke of Wenxian.
In the beginning, fragrant jujube trees were used as hedges.
Thus, the name was established based on the circumstances.
Although the rooms and halls were well-arranged, no jeweled pagoda had been built.
Wang Huan, the great-great-grandson of the Wang clan, Chief Minister of the Ministry of Personnel, and Grand Governor of Nanzhou,
had a profound understanding of the characteristics of the Dharma and thoroughly comprehended the ultimate truth.
His diligence and sincerity were evident externally, while his kindness and humility were promoted internally.
He did not eat past noon for eleven years.
Although I serve in the court, my affairs are close to the Naipo Garden.
Recently, I was appointed as the governor of Xiangzhou, with the title of Liufu.
My position rises with my age, and my salary increases with the years.
But I think of the grace and favor bestowed by the ruler, and the affection and trust of the imperial court.
I am entrusted to the east, deeply secluded and screened off.
I only wish to exhaust my abilities and thoughts, and do everything that can be done.
I harmonize the people below and spread the sage's grace above.
But I consider myself weak in power and far from the path, and will always be ashamed of my meager achievements.
Moreover, righteousness ends in this life, and the fruits of blessings come in the future.
This is not enough to repay the great kindness in the unseen world.
It does not express my sincere heart to the distant kalpas.
Since I rode in a carriage to Henggao and said farewell to the stream and island,
I vowed at the old temple to build a five-story pagoda.
I will donate a tenth of my salary, one out of ten.
In total, I will collect thirty-six thousand.

The eight spirits guard the room and myriad beings protect your body.
The precious foundation is lofty and vast, like the firm Mount Sumeru.

All sages extend auspiciousness.
Imbibe the harmony of heaven in the distant future.

Spread the excellence of the clan in Liang and Chu.

The barbarians submit and the border cities are at ease.
Families are equipped with the ten wholesome deeds and individuals possess the six perfections.
The demon hordes bow their heads and the non-Buddhists bend their knees.
Pull out the firewood to stop the fire, break the swords and destroy the edges.
Rescue the suffering and distress in the indiscriminate.
Ascend to the divine transformation at the peak of existence.
The three realms and five paths all share this vow.
Carve it on stone and bury it in the earth to illuminate this mind.
